product_name: Womo Designs Chassis Universal Handlebar Mount
long_description: Built to hold your favorite gadgets while you ride, the Womo Designs Chassis Universal Handlebar Mount attaches GoPro cameras, Garmin bike computers or NiteRider bike lights. The Womo Designs Chassis Universal Handlebar Mount is machined from aircraft grade aluminum to create high rigidity for extra stability. Accepts a total of 2 accessory kits so you can mount 2 gadgets in tandem; accessory kits sold separately. This item includes only the WomoDesigns Chassis Universal Handlebar Mount; GoPro cameras, Garmin bike computers and NiteRider bike lights are sold separately. Compatible with 31.8mm diameter handlebars; anodized and laser etched; not compatible with carbon-fiber handlebars.
short_description: Built to hold your favorite gadgets while you ride, the Womo Designs Chassis Universal Handlebar Mount attaches GoPro cameras, Garmin bike computers or NiteRider bike lights.
